title: Claire Purdy
text: Claire Purdy (born 1 April 1980) is an English female rugby union player. She represented at the <a href="2010%20Women%27s%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2010 Women's Rugby World Cup</a>. She was also named in the squad to the <a href="2014%20Women%27s%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2014 Women's Rugby World Cup</a>.
